title: We Would Love to Have You Here!  2 Bed 1 Bath Apartment
posting_body: ['Thank for choosing Regal Towers', 'Property Address', '27500 Franklin Rd,', 'Southfield, MI, 48034', '<URL>', 'Now available: Gorgeous 2 bed 1 bath apartment with all the amenities.', 'Great community and convenient location.', 'Rents start at $879.00 a month for these popular 840 Sq.', 'Ft. square foot units, so call to schedule a tour today!', 'Floor Plan Details', 'Name: 2 Bedroom', '2 Bedrooms / 1 Bathrooms', '840-860 Sq.', 'Ft.', '$879.00 - $1034.00', 'Community Amenities', 'Playground', 'Laundry Facilities', 'Swimming Pool', 'Tennis Court', 'Club House', 'Basketball Court', 'On-site Maintenance', '24-Hour emergency Maintenance', 'Full Equipped Fitness Center', 'Pets are Welcome (restrictions apply)', 'Public Transportation', 'BBQ Area', 'Gated Community', 'Property Contact', 'show contact info', 'David Capaul', 'ADA ACCESSIBLE', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY']
